item.title: Evidentiary Burdens and AI Models
item.description: This is part of ongoing work Dr. Sarah Cen is leading at Stanford’s Reglab. How are AI models changing the burden of proof claimants face when litigating against an AI model?

item.title: AI, Creativity, and IP Questions
item.description: How can we ensure creatives are being protected?

item.title: We Need to Rethink Trade Secrecy to Build Better AI
item.description: This paper was published in a special edition of Compiler magazine for the 2025 Paris AI Action Summit.

item.title: Cascading Secrecy: Tensions between IP and Transparency Objectives
item.description: This paper has been accepted to the 2024 UN Internet Governance Forum. It's online publication is not available yet, but a link will be added when it has been published.

item.title: Global AI Governance Strategy Roadmap
item.description: With rising geopolitical tensions, AI governance gets battled out on the global stage.

item.title: Location
item.description: Professor Dr von Igelfeld's mailing and office addresses at the Institute of Romance Philology.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Schedule and location for Professor Dr von Igelfeld's office hours.

item.title: Examining Generative Image Models Amidst Privacy Regulations
item.description: This paper reviews how privacy regulations in the US and EU may apply to generative image models. The paper explores market and public interest implications of different privacy law interpretations.

item.title: What is the relationship between race and the likelihood of getting stopped under stop-and-search laws in London?
List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology.

item.title: Profanity in Early Irish
item.description: This undergraduate course discusses profanity in Early Irish.
